name: 8BPlus Lilly Chalk Bag
description: Climbing is fun. Your chalkbag should be, too. When it's time to step up the fun factor, this handmade chalk bag brings oodles of character and silliness to even the burliest projects.Polyester fleece main fabric has a soft pile lining.Adjustable waist belt with clip closure fits most climbers.Holder houses your precious boar's hair brush.Stiff rim with 12.5cm access makes for easy chalking up.
